description: Smoked-glass eye shields with a greenish tint and chipped edges

core:description.text: A pair of smoked-glass shields darkened against kiln flare, the lenses carrying a faint green cast. Chips along the edges testify to stray grit, while a leather-and-rope strap cinches them tight over brow and nose. They leave narrow slots for airflow so they do not fog during long firing shifts.
